title: 4 Easy Steps to Make the Clay Element in Little Alchemy 2

steps.title: Combine Water and Earth to create Mud.
steps.content: Combine Water and Earth to create Mud. Water and Earth are starting elements you can use to create other elements.

steps.title: Combine Air and Air to create Pressure.
steps.content: Combine Air and Air to create Pressure. Air is a starting element.

steps.title: Combine Earth and Pressure to create Stone.
steps.content: Combine Earth and Pressure to create Stone. Earth is a starting element.

steps.title: Combine Mud and Stone to create Clay.
steps.content: Combine Mud and Stone to create Clay. This will create Clay in the early-game stage. [1] X Research source If you have more elements unlocked, you can also create Clay with the following recipes: Mud + Stone Mud + Sand Stone + Liquid Stone + Mineral Sand + Mineral Liquid + Rock Rock + Mineral You can also create wood , electricity , life , and even evil in Little Alchemy 2.
